ref: 3576 *krapyati ʻ howls ʼ, or with expressive doubling *krap- pati. [kŕ̊patē, aor. akrapiṣṭa ʻ howls, weeps ʼ RV., krápatē ʻ sympathizes with ʼ Dhātup. -- √kr̥p]
